name: Duelity (Nyacu)
description:
This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours.

Theme: Duality.
(Please note that there are some graphical issues with the post-processing due to WebGL. If you want to check out how the game really looks, download the files!)

Dual wield all sort of weapons and hack and slash against the different monsters that await you on this endless hallway. ¿How many will you bring with you to the gates of Hell?



Audio used:
